price: 5. Amar ka yimid Xaggayaga. Hubaal waxaanu nahay kuwa soo dira (Rusul),
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
